item.description:
Where even dreams may die!

DreamEscape is a roleplay-like story-focused solo puzzle adventure game. Great Cthulhu has trapped your sleeping mind in the Dreamlands. Your dream-self has shattered into multiple shards and fragments, scattered throughout the dream world. It is your task to recover these lost fragments, unravel the story secrets and survive long enough to find the correct key and matching gate that will let you escape and wake up!

To win you must avoid, adapt or overcome the many dangers of this nightmare world. You will need to carefully manage your pool of available skills, find items and artifacts, gain knowledge, use your memory, conserve both your vitality and sanity as well as employ two uniquely powerful abilities - Deja vu and Lucid dreaming - to stay ahead of the minions of Cthulhu.

Explore the changing landscape of the Dreamlands - travelling through many hundreds of unique story encounters - to find the correct key and its matching gate that will lead out of the realm and let you awaken from the nightmare. Success means coming awake, but failure leads to insanity, locked forever in a dream within your own mind!

Dreamescape is an exploration adventure game driven by story card encounters. Each encounter offers roleplay-style choices for the player to choose from to advance. Your choices lead down narrative branches that drive your game in new diverging directions each time you play. Repeated play changes and rewards your experience as you uncover more of the story puzzle. The chances of success is based on your character's set of skills, their equipment and the lore you have accumulated so far. But your own previous memory and knowledge of playing the game will help to give you the edge.

There are 6 uniquely unusual Dreamer characters to choose from, each with their own backstory. ~600 story encounter cards, ~120 unique Item/Artifacts to discover and ~120 Lore cards add to the highly varied narrative experience, meaning every game will turn out completely different.

The game offers multiple levels of interwoven story arcs and plot lines to keep you occupied and guessing each time you play. There are many hidden puzzles, traps and lore locked away in the game waiting for you to uncover... but all knowledge comes at a price. The more you experience, the greater your chances of being driven towards insanity!

—description from the publisher
